meanings.definition: Mitochondria: Organelles in cells that generate energy.
meanings.sent1: The mitochondria are like tiny power plants inside our cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study mitochondria to understand how cells produce energy.
meanings.sent3: The mitochondria in the cell were having a dance party, generating energy for the body.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a powerhouse, just like the mitochondria in our cells.
meanings.sent5: The mitochondria hummed with activity, fueling the cell with energy.

meanings.sent1: Many mitochondria work together to keep the cell functioning properly.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the mitochondria under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The mitochondria threw a party to celebrate being the powerhouse of the cell.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city of cells, the mitochondria were the hardworking citizens.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the mitochondria appeared as busy factories producing energy.
